Race.SpecificTitle: City of Crowley -- Prop. #1 - 3.5 Mill - Mayor & BOA - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 1
(RENEWAL OF WASTEWATER DISPOSAL FACILITIES TAX)

SUMMARY:  TO AUTHORIZE THE CITY OF CROWLEY TO LEVY AND COLLECT A THREE AND ONE-HALF (3.5) MILL TAX ("RENEWAL") ANNUALLY FOR A PERIOD OF TEN (10) YEARS FOR THE PURPOSE OF MAINTAINING THE WASTEWATER DISPOSAL FACILITIES.
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Crowley, State of Louisiana, (the "City") under the provisions of Article VI, Section 22, Section 27(b), Section 30(A) and Section 32 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, levy and collect a Three and One-Half (3.5) Mill Tax on all property subject to taxation situated within said City (current estimated annual amount of $189,000.00), annually for a period of ten (10) years, commencing with the year 2008 and ending in the year 2017 for the purpose of maintaining the wastewater disposal facilities?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Crowley -- Prop. #2 - 3 Mill - Mayor & BOA - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 2
(RENEWAL OF PUBLIC PARKS AND RECREATION TAX)

SUMMARY:  TO AUTHORIZE THE CITY OF CROWLEY TO LEVY AND COLLECT A THREE (3) MILL TAX ("RENEWAL") ANNUALLY FOR A PERIOD OF TEN (10) YEARS FOR THE PURPOSE OF PUBLIC PARKS AND RECREATION.
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Crowley, State of Louisiana, (the "City") under the provisions of Article VI, Section 22, Section 27(b), Section 30(A) and Section 32 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, levy and collect a Three (3) Mill Tax on all property subject to taxation situated within said City (current estimated annual amount of $162,000.00), annually for a period of ten (10) years, commencing with the year 2008 and ending in the year 2017 for the purpose of public parks and recreation?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Crowley -- Prop. #3 - 1 Mill - Mayor & BOA - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 3
(RENEWAL OF YOUTH RECREATION BUILDING MAINTENANCE TAX)

SUMMARY:  TO AUTHORIZE THE CITY OF CROWLEY TO LEVY AND COLLECT A ONE (1) MILL TAX ("RENEWAL") ANNUALLY FOR A PERIOD OF TEN (10) YEARS FOR THE PURPOSE OF YOUTH RECREATION BUILDING MAINTENANCE.
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Crowley, State of Louisiana, (the "City") under the provisions of Article VI, Section 22, Section 27(b), Section 30(A) and Section 32 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, levy and collect a One (1) Mill Tax on all property subject to taxation situated within said City (current estimated annual amount of $54,000.00), annually for a period of ten (10) years, commencing with the year 2008 and ending in the year 2017 for the purpose of youth recreation building maintenance?

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Iota -- 9 Mills - Mayor & BOA - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
TOWN OF IOTA PROPOSITION
(RENEWAL OF EXISTING NINE (9) MILL TAX)

SUMMARY:  TO AUTHORIZE THE TOWN OF IOTA TO LEVY AND COLLECT A NINE (9) MILL TAX ("RENEWAL") ANNUALLY FOR A PERIOD OF TEN (10) YEARS FOR THE PURPOSE OF CONSTRUCTION, MAINTENANCE AND REPLACEMENT OF PUBLIC STREETS, ROADS, AVENUES, ALLEYWAYS AND BRIDGES (INCLUDING DRAINAGE AND EQUIPMENT NECESSARY THEREFOR) IN SAID TOWN.
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Iota, State of Louisiana, (the "Town") under the provisions of Article VI, Section 22, Section 27(b), Section 30(A) and Section 32 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, levy and collect a Nine (9) Mill Tax on all property subject to taxation situated within said Town (current estimated annual amount of $28,111.32), annually for a period of ten (10) years, commencing with the year 2008 and ending in the year 2017 for the purpose of paying the cost of construction, maintenance, repair, overlay and replacement of public streets, roads, avenues, alleyways and bridges (including drainage and equipment necessary therefor) in the said Town?
